heading: Contact Me
description: You may use any of the following methods to collaborate with me

links.name: E-Mail
links.title: Electronic mail is my preferred method of non-public asynchronous contact

links.name: GitHub
links.title: FOSS projects and documentation are published to GitHub Organizations that I administrate

links.name: Matrix
links.title: Matrix is an open protocol for secure decentralized real time communication

links.name: Mastodon
links.title: Mastodon is free and open-source software for running self-hosted social networking services

links.name: StackExchange
links.title: Nearly a decade of answering questions with a high rate of success

links.name: Twitter (site formally known as X)
links.title: Where I share technical tips and tricks, often under 240 characters
